languages.text: "Я видела достаточно, чтобы понять, какие маски и жесты используют слуги Его, что приближены к тебе. Этого достаточно. Давай же вернемся на свои стези и удвоим старания в службе Неумирающему. Отныне — и навсегда".

traits.locale_text: "Я видела достаточно, чтобы понять, какие маски и какие жесты используют слуги Его, что приближены к тебе. Этого достаточно. Давай же вернемся на стезю, каждый на свою — и удвоим старания свои в службе Неумирающему. Отныне — и навсегда".

languages.text: "I have seen enough to understand what masks and gestures His servants use around you. That is enough. Let us each return to our respective threads and aspire to give our all to the Undying One, now and forever."
languages.original_text: "Я видела достаточно, чтобы понять, какие маски и жесты используют слуги Его, что приближены к тебе. Этого достаточно. Давай же вернемся на свои стези и удвоим старания в службе Неумирающему. Отныне — и навсегда".

traits.locale_text: "I have seen enough to understand what masks and gestures His servants use around you. Then that it where I will stop. Let us return each to our own way and aspire to give our all to the Undying One. Now and forever."

"I have seen enough to understand what masks and gestures His servants use around you. Then that it where I will stop. Let us return each to our own way and aspire to give our all to the Undying One. Now and forever."

"I have seen enough to understand what masks and gestures His servants use around you. That is enough. Let us each return to our respective ways and aspire to give our all to the Undying One, now and forever."

"I have seen enough to understand what masks and gestures His servants use around you. That is enough. Let us each return to our respective ways and aspire to give our all to the Undying One, now and forever."

"I have seen enough to understand what masks and gestures His servants use around you. That is enough. Let us each return to our respective threads and aspire to give our all to the Undying One, now and forever."

"I have seen enough to understand what masks and gestures His servants use around you. That is enough. Let us each return to our respective threads and aspire to give our all to the Undying One, now and forever."

languages.text: «He visto lo suficiente para entender qué máscaras y gestos usan Sus sirvientes con usted. Con eso es suficiente. Volvamos a nuestros respectivos hilos y aspiremos a entregarlo todo por el Inmortal, ahora y siempre».
languages.original_text: "I have seen enough to understand what masks and gestures His servants use around you. That is enough. Let us each return to our respective threads and aspire to give our all to the Undying One, now and forever."

traits.locale_text: «He visto lo suficiente para entender qué máscaras y gestos usan Sus sirvientes con usted. Con eso es suficiente. Volvamos a nuestros respectivos hilos y aspiremos a entregarlo todo por el Inmortal, ahora y siempre».

languages.text: 「主の従者たちがあなたの周りでどんな仮面や身振りを使っているのか、それを理解するのに十分なほど見てきたわ。もう十分。それぞれの糸に戻って、不死の方にすべてを捧げていきましょう。これからもずっと」
languages.original_text: "I have seen enough to understand what masks and gestures His servants use around you. That is enough. Let us each return to our respective threads and aspire to give our all to the Undying One, now and forever."

traits.locale_text: 「主の従者たちがあなたの周りでどんな仮面や身振りを使っているのか、それを理解するのに十分なほど見てきたわ。もう十分。それぞれの糸に戻って、不死の方にすべてを捧げていきましょう。これからもずっと」

languages.text: “我看得够多了，足以理解祂的仆人在你身边时都会戴着什么样的面具，使用什么样的手势。观察就到此为止吧，是时候返回各自的丝线上，将我们的一切献给我们的不死之神，直至永远。”
languages.original_text: "I have seen enough to understand what masks and gestures His servants use around you. That is enough. Let us each return to our respective threads and aspire to give our all to the Undying One, now and forever."

traits.locale_text: “我看得够多了，足以理解祂的仆人在你身边时都会戴着什么样的面具，使用什么样的手势。观察就到此为止吧，是时候返回各自的丝线上，将我们的一切献给我们的不死之神，直至永远。”

languages.text: "Ich habe genug gesehen, um zu verstehen, welche Masken und Gesten Seine Diener in Eurer Umgebung benutzen. Das reicht. Lasst uns zu unseren Fäden zurückkehren und alles für den Todlosen tun, jetzt und in aller Ewigkeit.
languages.original_text: "I have seen enough to understand what masks and gestures His servants use around you. That is enough. Let us each return to our respective threads and aspire to give our all to the Undying One, now and forever."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe genug gesehen, um zu verstehen, welche Masken und Gesten Seine Diener in Eurer Umgebung benutzen. Das reicht. Lasst uns zu unseren Fäden zurückkehren und alles für den Todlosen tun, jetzt und in aller Ewigkeit.

languages.text: « J'en ai assez vu pour comprendre de quels masques et gestes Ses serviteurs usent en votre présence. C'est amplement suffisant. Reprenons l'{mf|un|une} et l'autre nos fils respectifs, et tâchons de servir au mieux l'Immortel, maintenant et pour toujours. »
languages.original_text: "I have seen enough to understand what masks and gestures His servants use around you. That is enough. Let us each return to our respective threads and aspire to give our all to the Undying One, now and forever."

traits.locale_text: « J'en ai assez vu pour comprendre de quels masques et gestes Ses serviteurs usent en votre présence. C'est amplement suffisant. Reprenons l'{mf|un|une} et l'autre nos fils respectifs, et tâchons de servir au mieux l'Immortel, maintenant et pour toujours. »

languages.text: "O'nun hizmetkârlarının etrafında ne tür maskelerden ve hareketlerden faydalandığını anlayacak kadarını gördüm. Bu kadarı yetti. İkimiz de ipliklerimize dönüp kendimizi ezelden ebediyete dek Ölmeyen'e sunmayı amaç edinelim."
languages.original_text: "I have seen enough to understand what masks and gestures His servants use around you. That is enough. Let us each return to our respective threads and aspire to give our all to the Undying One, now and forever."
